name: Enforcer
description: You are skilled at causing fear in those you brutalize.
benefit: Whenever you deal nonlethal damage with a melee weapon, you can make an Intimidate check to demoralize your target as a free action. If you are successful, the target is shaken for a number of rounds equal to the damage dealt. If your attack was a critical hit, your target is frightened for 1 round with a successful Intimidate check, as well as being shaken for a number of rounds equal to the damage dealt.
staminaText: When you score a critical hit with a weapon dealing nonlethal damage, you can spend 5 stamina points to frighten the target for 1d4 rounds instead of 1 round.
